## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description              | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `checked`  | `checked`  | Set option as checked    | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disable the radio button | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value`    | `value`    | Radio button value       | `string`  | `undefined` |
